snippet: HENICK--William. We note with sorrow the passing of our longtime member, William Henick and extend sincerest condolences to his bereaved family. Rabbi Angela W. Buchdahl, President Abby Pogrebin, Central Synagogue of New York City 1/3
lead_paragraph: HENICK--William. We note with sorrow the passing of our longtime member, William Henick and extend sincerest condolences to his bereaved family. Rabbi Angela W. Buchdahl, President Abby Pogrebin, Central Synagogue of New York City 1/3
